#summary How to install MSYS shell environment for Windows

MSYS is a collection of GNU utilities to build applications and programs which depend on UNIX.

 # Download 'MSYS-1.0.11-2004.04.30-1.exe' from the download page at the MinGW website http://www.mingw.org/download.shtml onto your desktop or somewhere easy to locate.
 # Double click on the executable, read the release notes, and continue with the installation.
 # When asked for the destination directory it is advisable that you install to the folder (C:\msys\usr\) in order to prevent possible problems later
 # Continue with the installation using the default values.
 # Click the install button and the MSYS will be installed automatically.
